title: Fal’s Software Optimizes Nvidia Chips Says CEO
description: Burkay Gur, CEO of generative-media platform fal, discusses how the company uses Nvidia chips as part of its stack to run AI models for audio, video and image generation. Gur joins Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow on “Bloomberg Tech” off the back of fal’s latest fundraise.  (Source: Bloomberg)

title: Paramount Offering to 'Overpay' for Warner Bros.: Ross Gerber
description: Ross Gerber, CEO of Gerber Kawasaki, discusses the offers to buy Warner Bros. Discovery and explains why he sold his Paramount Skydance stake and held on to Netflix. He joins Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow on “Bloomberg Tech.” (Source: Bloomberg)

title: Accenture, Anthropic Launch New AI Partnership
description: Accenture and Anthropic announced a major expansion of their partnership to help enterprises move from AI pilots to full-scale deployment, forming the Accenture Anthropic Business Group with approximately 30,000 professionals to be trained. Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei and Accenture CEO Julie Sweet talk about the project on "Bloomberg The Close." (Source: Bloomberg)
